cast.overview: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places. Mitsuha wakes up in Taki’s body, and he in hers. This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.
cast.title: Your Name.

also_known_as: やまぐち ともひろ
details.biography: Tomohiro Yamaguchi (山口 智広, Yamaguchi Tomohiro, December 26, 1987) is a Japanese voice actor from Tokyo. He is affiliated with Tokyo Actor's Consumer's Cooperative Society (Haikyō). He was formerly affiliated with B-Box until March 31, 2023. His former stage name is Tomohiro Yamaguchi (山口智大). On March 23, 2017 he changed his name spelling from 山口智大 to 山口智広.
details.name: Tomohiro Yamaguchi
